title: lost game cuz of riot servers
body:
just lost my last game cuz the server made me dc for like 10 minutes as well as a teammate for a couple minutes
any loss forgiven while getting my lp back?

replies.body:
The service incident that affected NA had been resolved hours before this discussion was posted. If you're still experiencing issues with your connection to League, please let me know so we can work together to resolve it.

Let me know if you have any questions.
LoL NA is currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
